attributes.action: Allow "The Lords Prayer" to be shown before films in cinemas.
attributes.additional_details:
Christianity has been part of this country's tradition for over 1000 years. The Christian faith has served this country well over many centuries and it is no coincidence in my opinion that the country has prospered both economically and culturally while we have been able to identify ourselves as a Christian country.

Christians should stand up for their cultural heritage and not allow secularist and atheist to dismantle these.
attributes.background:
"The Lords Prayer" is a beautiful prayer that should offend no one. 

This is a Christian country and we Christians should defend our Christian identity and Christian values and traditions - they have been a part of this country for over 1000 years.

rejection.details:
This decision is a result of the policy of Digital Cinema Media, not a decision by the Government or Parliament.

You may wish to write to DCM to make your views known.
